title: Tchotchke E-Commerce Site
description: An e-commerce site, akin to an online goodwill for antiques and oddities, eliminates bidding anxiety by offering fixed prices, ensuring a stress-free shopping experience with a clean user interface.

title: Library App
description: This application allows users to reserve library books and access detailed book information within a clean, user-friendly interface.

title: Puppy Bowl Manager
description: This project demonstrates the development of a dynamic single-page application (SPA) for managing a sports team roster, leveraging a client-server architecture with the front-end interacting with a separate API for data retrieval and manipulation.
